title: Can't Change Servers and it was supposed to be available on 11/20
body: I have been checking the store all day long and the server change option is unavailable even when you guys said it was going to be available on November 20th. Is it me? Help please.

replies.body: We're still working on getting those transfers back up, but there are still a few technical issues they need to get ironed out before they will be back up. HollyMonster has been commenting on what's going on over in [**this thread**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/xWLAkZKW-account-transfers-going-on-cooldown?comment=006e)!
